name: Christian's Don't Play Video Games
description:
Sketche99 2013 CDN Speedgame entry - Christian's Don't Play Video Games

File Formats:
Unity Windows .exe
Unity Android .apk

Programs Used:
Unity 4
iClone 5 Pro

Unity 4 Assets Used:
Universal Video Texture Lite by Royie Kahalany
Localized Dialogs & Cutscenes by Mel Georgiou
5 Minute GUI by Inane Game
(was going to use NGUI by Tasharen Entertainment 
for gamepad support on Ouya but ran out of time :)

iClone 5 Pro Assets Used:
Anime Trey by Cypher Wolf
Kenji G3 Character by Cypher Wolf
Anime School Time by Cypher Wolf
iAnime Face by Cypher Wolf

Music Used:
Sonicfire Pro 5 and Smartsound Albums
"Hymns Revisited" & "Core Sessions"

Created in 22 hours over 4 days

Tested on following android devices:
Ouya (android version jellybean) - main menu buttons nearly impossible to read on the big screen / need to use touch pad to bring up mouse cursor and tap touch pad to select buttons

Acer Iconia Tab A500 (android version ice cream sandwich) - no issues

HTC Evo 3D (android version ice cream sandwich) - no issues

LG Optimus Dynamic (android version gingerbread) - text too big for menu buttons / text in main game unreadable
